docs.lead_paragraph: ROBERT CHANLER has fathered a group of Russian pilgrims, as they call themselves, and is giving them an exhibition ill his studio. On the opening afternoon it was filled with many people, many languages and as many points of view. "What is this?" said a bewildered spectator. "A city," said a smiling artist, a wistful smile, and one felt annoyed and sympathetic with both the question and the answer.
